article_title: Air Canada suspends all Saint John flights, some Moncton trips
article_description: The Saint John Airport will no longer have flights arriving and departing as of Monday  April 6  as Air Canada suspends more New Brunswick flights
article_content: The Saint John Airport will have no more flights arriving and departing as of Monday as Air Canada suspends more New Brunswick flights Saint John Airport director of Commercial Development  Jacques Fournier said Wednesday that Air Canada suspended a flight    3125 chars
